oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 7: Organic Farming in Wales
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anon,
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This factsheet provides information on what organic farming is, how important it is in Wales, the role of Organic Centre Wales and details on how to find more information on organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Anon, (2002) Organic Centre Wales Factsheet 7: Organic Farming in Wales. Organic Centre Wales.
